comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: White House wedding of the President's daughter, Jessie Woodrow Wilson, to Francis Bowes Sayre.

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: That's a not-often-seen perspective of the White House.  This area must be inside the fence, now.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- Bain's caption says "White House," not "Wh. House."
